text: The 2010 Stanley Cup Final was the best-of-seven NHL championship series of the 2010 Stanley Cup playoffs. It was between the Western Conference champion Chicago Blackhawks and the Eastern Conference champion Philadelphia Flyers. It was Chicago's eleventh time in the Final. The last time was in 1992 with a loss to the Pittsburgh Penguins. It was Philadelphia's eighth time in the Final. The last time was in 1997 with a loss to the Detroit Red Wings. Chicago beat Philadelphia four games to two to win their fourth Stanley Cup. Blackhawks captain Jonathan Toews won the Most Valuable Player. He was the first Blackhawks player to win this honor. ==References== Category:Ice hockey competitions Category:Stanley Cup Finals Category:2010 in ice hockey Category:Chicago Blackhawks Category:Philadelphia Flyers Category:2010 in Illinois Category:2010s in Chicago Category:2010s in Pennsylvania
title: 2010 Stanley Cup Finals
